CustomField.description: If the call was passed out of the Natterbox service to a PSTN number, it is this number that was dialled - in international format.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of the call recipient in E164 format. If the call is answered by a Natterbox user, this field will be left blank. For details on numbers answered by Natterbox users, use the ConnectedNumber field instead.
CustomField.label: E164ConnectedNumber
